Package com.adidas.connect.ui.item

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CarouselItemPageAdapter.OnCarouselItemClicked
    Interface to notify when an item has been clicked
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseCarouselItemRepository
    Base class to provide custom list of items for Carousel on ProfileAccountFragment.
    CarouselItem
    Class used to represent a Carousel item in the ProfileAccountFragment
    CarouselItemPageAdapter
    PagerAdapter class used to draw the Profile Carousel used in ProfileAccountFragment As the adapter needs to know the screen width in order to make the proper calculations to align last element to produce effect of loop a method to set this is created.
    CarouselItemRepository
    Dummy class to centralize the storage for CarouselItems
